data.name: Stack Gun Heroes
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

Stack Gun Heroes is a fast paced first person shooter for 1-4 players. Design guns, build a massive base, and save entire robot civilizations with ingenious weaponry of your own design.



Bounce + Explosion = A gun that gets incredibly strong if you bank the bullet off a wall.

Other guns we have seen testers invent:
  • A gun that abducts people into the upper stratosphere.
  • A gun that shoots a bomb that splits into 5 bombs, which each split into 5 bombs, which split into 4 bombs, which explode.
  • A gun that makes the wielder fly.
  • A gun that injects enemies with turrets that burst out and shoot everyone else.
  • A gun that attracts enemies into walls so hard they explode.
  • A gun that shoots guns at people. Those guns shoot more guns which shoot people.
  • A nuclear warhead machine gun.



Alpha testers have only scratched the surface of what is possible. Stack Gun Heroes is both a game and an experiment to see what people can make with stacking.




There are tons of goals to achieve with your guns. Do missions, build a base, collect procedural superpowers, acquire dozens of resource types, and unlock upgrades. Many volunteer alpha testers have played for hundreds of hours. Some for thousands.

KEY FEATURES
  • Try the most advanced gun building system ever made. Make gravity bombs, lightning lassos, and things we can't list because you haven't invented them yet.
  • Build a massive base to support your operations. Use dozens of unique block types including Defense Turrets, Elevators, Boosters, Superpower Storage Units, Ammo Dispensers, and Recyclers.
  • Experiment with millions of meaningfully distinct procedural superpowers. Shoot rockets from your hands, call nukes from the sun, teleport, slow down enemies and more. Discover powers that even the developer didn't know existed.
  • Play alone or with friends. Easily bring your entire base into online co-op with up to 4 people. Or hold off armies of robots solo with nothing but your ingenious gun designs to fall back on.
  • No max difficulty.

data.short_description: The FPS with the most advanced gun building system ever made. Master the art of stacking as you battle robots, construct a massive base, experiment with superpowers, and save entire planets from annihilation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i5-2500k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800GT With 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: i5-11600k or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980ti/1660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
